abstract: Gov Yoichi Masuzoe of Tokyo resigns in face of cratering approval ratings and defections by his political allies; Masuzoe had previously admitted using political campaign funds for personal activities.

headline.print_headline: Tokyo Governor Resigns Over Spending Scandal
headline.main: Tokyo Governor, Yoichi Masuzoe, Resigns Over Spending Scandal

snippet: Mr. Masuzoe, who will step down on Tuesday, is the second governor of the city to quit over a financial scandal in two and a half years.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Masuzoe, who will step down on Tuesday, is the second governor of the city to quit over a financial scandal in two and a half years.
